name: Illumio
description: Illumio is a provider of a SaaS platform offering automated enforcement against cyberattacks. Illumio is a cloud security company that stops cyber threats of unauthorized communications through adaptive segmentation. It is a data center and cloud security company led by veterans with deep experience in virtualization, networking, and security hailing from industry leaders such as VMware, Cisco, Juniper, McAfee, and Nicira.
